properties.displayName: DNS events related to mining pools
properties.description: Identifies IP addresses that may be performing DNS lookups associated with common currency mining pools.

| where Name contains "."
| where Name has_any ("monerohash.com", "do-dear.com", "xmrminerpro.com", "secumine.net", "xmrpool.com", "minexmr.org", "hashanywhere.com",
